name: The One
content: Oh when the stars in the night
I will put on a fight
Yeah I'll be the one there
Yeah I'll be the one there
Yeah I'll be the one there
Fallin into your arms arms baby
Glowing we are on the run run
But when the stars in the night
I will put on a fight
Yeah I'll be the one there
Hold you when the times go rough
On the daily on the daily
I'll be there for you cause
Nothing can break this oh break me
But when the stars in the night
I will put on a fight
Yeah I'll be the one there
You know that there I'll be
Put my name on that its guaranteed
I'll be the one your trustee
Hold you down when things go bad
Call me I will get there fast
I'm the one that you can trust
Through the night morning till dusk
